title: Teaching Sociology - COVID-19 Remote Learning Transition in Spring 2020: Class Structures, Student Perceptions, and Inequality in College Courses
itunes:title: Teaching Sociology - COVID-19 Remote Learning Transition in Spring 2020: Class Structures, Student Perceptions, and Inequality in College Courses
description: Authors Alanna Gillis and Laura M. Krull discuss their article, "COVID-19 Remote Learning Transition in Spring 2020: Class Structures, Student Perceptions, and Inequality in College Courses," published in the October 2020 issue of Teaching Sociology.
content:encoded: Authors Alanna Gillis and Laura M. Krull discuss their article, "COVID-19 Remote Learning Transition in Spring 2020: Class Structures, Student Perceptions, and Inequality in College Courses," published in the October 2020 issue of Teaching Sociology.
